name: oksol
description:
This cove is very stupid. His brain is the size of a walnut. However, he likes to be a smart person. A fool sees the world very strangely. To be smart, he must find 6 big golden brains. He hates scientists, teachers and books. Ahmagh only knows how to jump off the platforms and eat cheese.

made by Soheil Abak

controls :

Arrow keys : move

A : create bomb

S : jump

D :  Detonate the bomb
